remarks: The result of the group power operator.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Apr-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
gxfval.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
gxfval.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
gxfval.3 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
gxfval.4 $e |- P = ( ^g ` G ) $.
gxval $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( A P K ) = if ( K = 0 , U , if ( 0 < K , ( seq 1 ( G , ( NN X. { A } ) ) ` K ) , ( N ` ( seq 1 ( G , ( NN X. { A } ) ) ` -u K ) ) ) ) ) $.
